projects.title: Information site
projects.descr: In the summer of 2019 I taught myself React.js. I made this site while learning, so that I had a project to apply the things that I learned. The goal was to make a website where I found the information that I needed in a day. Some of the websites I visited the most was to get updateded on the news, check the weather and check what football games that were being played today. Therefore I made a website that has all this information on one website.

projects.title: Portfolio site
projects.descr: A simple website I made with React.js to easily present the projects that I have done.

projects.title: API for projects
projects.descr: An API that provides data for two projects that I have made. It collects data from other APIs, such as news data, weather data and football data. It was made with Python and Flask

projects.title: TODO list with React.js
projects.descr: A simple TODO list I made. It was the very first project I built with React.js. Simply followed a youtube tutorial on how to kake a TODO list in React.js
